SEARCH
Package com.comp2042.events

Interface InputEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface InputEventListener
Interface for handling input events that affect the game state. Controllers implement this to respond to movement and rotation commands.

  • Method Details

    • onDownEvent

      DownData onDownEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a downward movement event (gravity or soft drop).
      Parameters:
      event - The move event details.
      Returns:
      Data containing the result of the move, including any cleared rows.

    • onLeftEvent

      ViewData onLeftEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a left movement event.
      Parameters:
      event - The move event details.
      Returns:
      Updated view data reflecting the new position.

    • onRightEvent

      ViewData onRightEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a right movement event.
      Parameters:
      event - The move event details.
      Returns:
      Updated view data reflecting the new position.

    • onRotateEvent

      ViewData onRotateEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a rotation event.
      Parameters:
      event - The move event details.
      Returns:
      Updated view data reflecting the new orientation.

    • createNewGame

      void createNewGame()
      Resets the game state to start a new game.
